Name: aluminium, ingot, primary, import from South America | aluminium, primary, ingot | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/24:Manufacture of basic metals/242:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals/2420:Manufacture of basic precious and other non-ferrous metals
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12469/documentation

This dataset represents the amount of imported primary aluminium from South America to EU27 & EFTA. The import value is valid for 2015 and includes all  imports, independently whether used within the importing region, or re-exported. EAA statistics

This activity represents the point of "handing over" the primary aluminium ingot from one country to the other at the border.
